story:
Once upon a time, in a beautiful village in Sri Lanka, there was a young elephant named Kavindu. Kavindu was known for his gentle nature and kind heart. He loved exploring the lush forests and playing in the rivers with his friends.

One sunny day, as Kavindu was taking a stroll through the village, he heard a soft cry coming from the edge of the forest. Curious, he followed the sound and discovered a tiny monkey named Mihira who had gotten lost. Mihira was scared and alone, but Kavindu greeted her with a warm smile and offered to help her find her way back home.

Together, Kavindu and Mihira set off on an adventure through the forest, with Kavindu leading the way with his big ears and wise eyes. Along the way, they encountered friendly birds, colorful butterflies, and playful squirrels. The forest was alive with the sounds of nature, and Kavindu and Mihira felt a sense of wonder and joy as they journeyed together.

As the sun began to set, Kavindu and Mihira finally arrived at Mihira's home in the treetops. Her family and friends were overjoyed to see her safe and sound, thanks to the kind elephant who had come to her rescue.

Mihira thanked Kavindu for his kindness and invited him to visit anytime he wished. Kavindu smiled and waved goodbye, feeling happy to have made a new friend and helped someone in need.

And so, as the stars twinkled in the sky and the moon shone brightly above, the village of Sri Lanka was filled with the peaceful sounds of a happy ending to a heartwarming adventure.

And with that, Kavindu returned to his cozy spot under a tall tree, feeling grateful for the love and friendship that surrounded him in the magical world of the Sri Lankan forest.

The end. Goodnight, little one. Sweet dreams.
